          "alive": true,

          "properties": {
            "title": [
              ["And lastly, let’s see three different methods of "],
              ["writing", [["b"]]],
              [" data to a file. The difference between "],
              ["appending", [["i"]]],
              [" and "],
              ["writing", [["i"]]],
              [" being that writing "],
              ["over-writes", [["b"]]],
              [" the data in the file while appending "],
              ["adds", [["b"]]],
              [
                " to the data in the file. If the file you specify doesn’t exist, each method will automatically create the file before attempting to write the data to it."
              ]
            ]
